name: Peace Lily
description: The Peace Lily is known for its elegant white flowers and is perfect for indoor spaces.

name: Snake Plant
description: The Snake Plant is a hardy indoor plant that adds a touch of modern style.

name: Sunflower
description: Bright and cheery, the Sunflower is a classic choice for gardens and bouquets.

name: Spider Plant
description: The Spider Plant is known for its arching leaves and is easy to care for indoors.

name: Rose
description: Symbolizing love, the Rose comes in various colors and adds beauty to any garden.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera is not only decorative but also known for its medicinal properties.

name: Orchid
description: Orchids are elegant flowering plants, perfect for indoor spaces and special occasions.

name: Bamboo Palm
description: The Bamboo Palm adds a tropical touch to indoor spaces and is easy to care for.

name: Tulip
description: Tulips are vibrant spring flowers that come in a variety of colors.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: The Fiddle Leaf Fig is a popular choice for indoor decoration, known for its large, violin-shaped leaves.

name: Lyrata
description: Add a touch of urban garden to your environments. With decorative succulents and plants you can make endless combinations, as well as choose from among different types of pots made from fabric, ceramic, cement or glass. If you want to go green but don't have time to keep watering plants, this is your collection.

name: Kalanchoe
description: The Kalanchoe tomentosa succulent is a decorative plant that will add a touch of urban garden to your environments. In combination with its cement pot with white geometric details, it will also fit in any space. The perfect accessory for bringing freshness into your interior spaces.

name: Filicopsida
description: Add a touch of urban garden to your environments. With decorative succulents and plants you can make endless combinations, as well as choose from among different types of pots made from fabric, ceramic, cement or glass. If you want to go green but don't have time to keep watering plants, this is your collection.

name: Leonitis
description: This decorative leonitis leonurus plant is ideal to add greenery to your home, it also allows you to relax without any worries. We know your time is precious, so keep it just for you.
